Module Assignment3_249

Package Exceptions

package Exceptions
  • Exceptions
    Class
    Description
    BadIsbn10Exception
    The `BadIsbn10Exception` class is an exception that is thrown to indicate an error related to an invalid ISBN-10 format.
    BadIsbn13Exception
    The `BadIsbn13Exception` class is an exception that is thrown to indicate an error related to an invalid ISBN-13 format.
    BadPriceException
    The `BadPriceException` class is an exception that is thrown to indicate an error related to an invalid price format.
    BadYearException
    The `BadYearException` class is an exception that is thrown to indicate an error related to an invalid price format.
    MissingFieldException
    The `MissingFieldException` class is an exception that is thrown to indicate an error related to missing fields in a book record.
    TooFewFieldsException
    This exception is thrown when a record or object has too few fields.
    TooManyFieldsException
    This exception is thrown when a book has too many fields.
    UnknownGenreException
    This exception is thrown when an unknown or unsupported genre is encountered.
